title: How to praise Allah before making dua? - Sheikh Assimalhakeem
transcript: sumaya says I'd like to know in detail how to praise Allah before making dua C praising Allah Azza WA JAL is not something that is fixed you praise Allah by saying Allah whom Allah could have and I am somehow at you are out of the omen faheen now I look at him and then all similar to are you praise Allah you describe Allah with these beautiful names and attributes in the beginning and then you go on so it's not something that I can tell you in a nutshell
